name: Slowtide Quick-Dry Towel - Unisex
description:
Dry off after a dip with this plush towel that used to be a water bottle, well, lots of water bottles.Soft recycled polyester that will absorb 4x its weight in water and dries quickly.Tight weave keeps sand from creeping through.Lightweight design tucks easily into beach bags.OEKO-TEX 100® certified fabric gives you the confidence that what is next to your skin has been made with the utmost care.

        Sustainability
